channel.title: Ugh what now?
channel.description:
I have now downloaded ' TestScape' but what now ? rofl
Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
Name: 1 IP address: 2 TCP Ports to open: 43594 UDP Ports to open: Inbound Filter: Allow All Schedule: Always
That makes no frigen sense what so ever!! How can u go to ur router on internet ? and login :S.
Plz tell me! thx. f[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 04:21:27 PM[/size][hr]160 users on.. not one could take a second to help me ? :(

item.title: Ugh what now?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Find out your router IP
( that’s if you have one )
Then log in…
If you don’t know ask the owner of your router ( if that’s you and you still don’t know )
Try User: Admin Pass: Password
then I dunno ask the person who sold it ?

Read full topic

item.title: Ugh what now?
item.dc:creator: @Twirly Twirly
item.description:
@Twirly wrote:

I have now downloaded ’ TestScape’ but what now ? rofl

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Name: 1
IP address: 2
TCP Ports to open: 43594
UDP Ports to open:
Inbound Filter: Allow All
Schedule: Always

That makes no frigen sense what so ever!! How can u go to ur router on internet ? and login :S.

Plz tell me! thx. f[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 04:21:27 PM[/size][hr]160 users on… not one could take a second to help me ?

Read full topic
